quote1.author: Steve Jobs
qoute: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works

quote2.author: Lorinda Mamo
quote: Every great design begins with an even better story

quote3.author: Albert Einstein (German physicist)
quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?

quote4.author: Charles Shackleton (Master Craftsman)
quote: In 100 years time all the corners are rounded off, there are dents, dings. It is a souvenir of life and history

quote5.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you

quote6.author: Ghost
quote: Keep Your Blood In, You’ll Need Every Drop.

quote7.author: Soap
quote: Kids, Guns And Balloons... That’s A New One.

quote8.author: Sun Tzu
quote: A leader leads by example not by force.

quote9.author: Herbert Hoover
quote: Older men declare war. But it is the youth that must fight and die.

quote10.author: Prem Ramchandani
quote: I regret I have but one life to give for my country

quote11.author: Captain Manoj Pandey
quote: If a death strikes before I prove my blood, I promise, I will kill death.
